adjectives.description: patibulary (comparative more patibulary, superlative most patibulary)

entries.meaning: (now rare, chiefly humorous) Pertaining to the gallows or hanging.
examples: Masius  […]  conceiveth thereby some kind of crucifixion, at least some patibulary affixion after he was slain, and so represented unto the people until toward the evening.
